mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, U.PROFILE_ORIGINAL_NAME AS PROFILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, U.PROFILE_UUID AS PROFILE_UUID, U.AMBITION_QUOTE AS AMBITION_QUOTE, F.FOLLOWER_ID AS FOLLOWER_ID, F.FOLLOWEE_ID AS FOLLOWEE_ID FROM USER U LEFT JOIN FOLLOW F ON U.USER_ID = F.FOLLOWER_ID
